parameters.name: SketchType
parameters.description: Type of entity with which to divide this sketch segment as defined in swSketchSegmentType_e

parameters.name: SegmentPoints
parameters.description: 2 <= Number of sketchType entities into which to divide this sketch segment <= 100

title: ISketchSegment.EqualSegment
description: Divides this sketch segment into equally spaced sketch segments or points.
signature:
System.Boolean EqualSegment( 
   System.Int32
SketchType
,
   System.Int32
SegmentPoints
)

parameters.name: SketchType
parameters.description: Type of entity with which to divide this sketch segment as defined in swSketchSegmentType_e

parameters.name: SegmentPoints
parameters.description: 2 <= Number of sketchType entities into which to divide this sketch segment <= 100

returns: True if successful, false if not
